reviewText: My kids love this. Great for a spare 15 minutes here and there

I received the first tape and in two of the four lessons the voice was not playing. There was sound (music) but no voices. I returned for and received a prompt exchange, but the exchanged DVD has the same problems.
I am an elementary art teacher and I love showing Mark Kistler to them. The kids (even kindergarten) are very interested in his show. His drawings go at a good pace for them to keep up.
